.. currentmodule:: data

Data & Statistics
=================

The **data** module brings several tools to make parsing data
slightly easier. The main class to use here is :class:`Stats`

.. autoclass:: Stats
    :members:

Season
~~~~~~
This is a season salad.

.. autoclass:: Season
    :members:

Player
~~~~~~
Player 2 has joined the game.

.. autoclass:: Player
    :members:
